anya-e0905n0:4_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṁ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso kathaṁ sāvetuṁ, tasmā āyasmato ca javanattherassa pakhukkūnagaravāsino āyasmato ca vicittasārābhivaṁsassa tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa vinayapucchanabhārañca vinayavissajjana bhārañca āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana vinayavissajjana kiccāni yathādhammaṁ yathāvinayaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:8_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:12_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā javanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:14_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:17_0: Vissajjanā – sudinnaṁ bhante kalandaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:19_1: sudindo bhante kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:20_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:21_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti dve anupaññattiyo, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:28_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:30_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:31_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:32_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:39_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, ayaṁ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:40_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:41_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ, 1 - saṅghasuṭṭhutāya, 2 - saṅghaphāsutāya, 3 - dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahāya, 4 - pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ phāsuvihārāya, 5 - diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānaṁ saṁvarāya, 6 - samparāyikānaṁ āsavānaṁ paṭighātāya, 7 - appasannānaṁ pasādāya, 8 - pasannānaṁ bhiyyobhāvāya, 9 - saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, 10 - vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:49_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:51_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:55_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicitthasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhamassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ, vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññatti anupaññattiādīnipi pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmāvicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi, itihidaṁ bhante paṭhamaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariya saṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ paṭhama pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ ekatosajjhāyanavasena saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:59_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṁ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso kathaṁ sāvetuṁ, tasmā āyasmatoca sobhanassa sāsanari sārāmādhivāsino āyasmatoca vicittasārābhivaṁsassa tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa vinayapucchanabhārañca vinayavissajjanabhārañca āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana vinayavissajjana kiccāni yathādhammaṁ yathāvinayaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:62_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:66_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadisaṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā sobhanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:68_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:71_0: Vissajjanā – dhaniyaṁ bhante kumbhakāraputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:73_0: Vissajjanā – dhaniyo bhante kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṁ ādiyi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:74_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:75_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:77_1: yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya, yathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi muḷhosi thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:79_0: Vissajjanā – gāmāvā araññāvāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:81_1: yo pana bhikkhu gāmāvā araññāvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya, kathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:88_0: Pucchā – tasmiṁ āvuso dutiya pārājike adinnaṁ ādiyanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n0:89_1: adinnaṁ bhante ādiyanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, pañca māsakaṁvā atireka pañca māsakaṁvā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti pārājikassa, ūnapañcamāsakaṁvā atirekamāsakaṁvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti thullaccayassa, māsakaṁvā ūnamāsakavā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti dukkaṭassa, adinnaṁ bhante ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:91_1: dasannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti, sakasaññissa, vissāsaggāhena gaṇhantassa, tāvakālikaṁ gaṇhantassa, petapariggahaṁ gaṇhantassa, tiracchānagatapariggahaṁ gaṇhantassa, paṁsukūlasaññissa, ummattakassa, khittacittassa, vedanāṭṭassa, ādikammikassāti.
anya-e0905n0:92_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ katthapariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:94_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:95_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:96_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:98_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:100_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:101_1: tīhi bhante samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācāto, siyā vācātoca
anya-e0905n0:102_0: Cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācātoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:103_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:105_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:106_0: Vissajjanā – dvihi bhante samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññāta karaṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:107_0: Pucchā – ko āvuso tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:108_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:109_0: Pucchā – kiṁāvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ tattha adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:110_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:116_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:117_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_2: Saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahāya pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ phāsuvihārāya diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānaṁ saṁvarāya samparāyikānaṁ āsavānaṁ paṭighātāya appasannānaṁ pasādāya pasannānaṁ bhiyyobhāvāya saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:126_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:128_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:131_1: atthi nu kho āvuso tattha upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:134_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsa tipiṭakadharadhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ dutiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ, vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññattimpi pucchiṁ, anupaññattimpi pucchiṁ, āpattimpi pucchiṁ, anāpattimpi pucchiṁ, aññānipi īdisāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni anekāni pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi.
anya-e0905n0:134_1: Iti hidaṁ bhante idaṁ dutiyaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ, suparisuddhaṁ, tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathā pure mahākassa pādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā, bahujanahitāya, bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya, hitāya, sukhāya, devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ dutiya pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṅgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:136_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā (pa) sammāsambuddhena tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:139_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:141_1: sambahulā bhante bhikkhu aññamaññaṁ jīvitā voropesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:142_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:143_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:145_1: yopana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṁvāssa pariyeseyya ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:147_1: maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyya ambhopurisa kiṁ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā
anya-e0905n0:148_0: Seyyāti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:150_1: yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṁvāssa pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ambho purisa kiṁ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā seyyoti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁvā saṁvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:155_0: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhatopaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:157_1: tasmiṁ āvuso tatiya pārājike sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:158_1: sañcissa bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, manussaṁ odissa papātaṁ khaṇati papatitvā marissatīti āpatti dukkaṭassa, papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati āpatti thullaccayassa, marati āpatti pārājikassa, sañcicca bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:160_1: sattannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti, asañcicca mārentassa, ajānantassa, na maraṇādhippāyassa, ummattakassa, khittacittassa, vedanāṭṭassa, ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:161_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:163_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:164_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:165_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:167_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:169_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:170_1: channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato , siyā vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:171_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:173_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:174_1: sattānaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati, sammukhā vinayenaca paṭiññātakaraṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:175_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:176_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:177_0: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:178_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:184_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:185_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:186_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya (pa) vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:194_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:196_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:199_1: atthinukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:202_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ tatiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ, vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññattimpi pucchiṁ, anupaññattimpi pucchiṁ, āpattimpi pucchiṁ, anāpattimpi pucchiṁ, aññānipi evarūpāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni anekāni pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi, itihidaṁ bhante tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa, tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:204_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe…
anya-e0905n0:207_0: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:209_1: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:210_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:211_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:213_1: yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya, itijānāmi itipassāmīti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīya mānovā asamanuggāhīya mānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musāvilapinti ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:215_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra adhimānāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:216_0: Honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino asacchikate sacchikatasaññano adhimānena aññaṁ byākaronti, tañca kho etaṁ abbohārikaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:218_1: yopana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya, iti jānāmi iti passāmīti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānovā asamanuggāhīyamānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁjānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musā vilapinti, aññatra adhimānā ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇa paññatti.
anya-e0905n0:219_0: Pucchā – sabbatthapaññatti nukho āvuso padesapaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:223_0: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhato paññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:225_1: tasmiṁ āvuso catuttha pārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati, vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n0:226_1: tasmiṁ bhante catutthapārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati āpattipārājikassa, yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahāti bhaṇati paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa, appaṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa, uttarimanussadhammaṁ bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:228_1: channaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:229_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:231_0: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:232_0: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:233_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:235_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:237_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:238_1: channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato, siyā vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:239_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:241_0: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:242_1: sattannaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati, sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññātakaraṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:243_0: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:244_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:245_0: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ, kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:246_0: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:252_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:253_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:254_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya…pe…
anya-e0905n0:262_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:264_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:267_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
